hypothesis_content.title: Solana On-Chain Volume Divergence Alpha
hypothesis_content.statement: When Solana's 7-day average on-chain trading volume exceeds its 30-day average by >40% (current news: surpassing Binance+Bybit), SOL price will outperform BTC by >8% over the next 5 trading days, provided total crypto market cap is above $2.1T.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Extreme on-chain volume spikes on Solana indicate network utility surge and capital rotation from centralized exchanges. Historical data shows such divergences precede SOL outperformance as liquidity migrates from BTC/ETH to high-utility L1s.
entry_conditions: SOL 7D avg on-chain volume > 1.4 * SOL 30D avg volume

exit_conditions.take_profit: SOL/BTC ratio increases by 8% from entry
exit_conditions.stop_loss: SOL/BTC ratio decreases by 4% from entry

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: SOL/BTC ratio fails to increase >3% within 5 days despite volume spike, or volume normalizes within 2 days without price follow-through.
